title: Stilled Lives: The T-Town Murders
description: A series of gruesome murders of young children shocks everyone in the small city of Torrington, Connecticut. Three men, unmoored from their former lives, meet in the library to scour clues and use their skills to help catch a psychopath. A mysterious woman who assisted them in past investigations offers one word which sets them off on their treacherous journey to find a killer and end a bloody rampage which has followed two of them from Baltimore.
author: Anna Burdette
